title: Food Drive at Sofi Stadium
description: ID is required, limit 1 per person. There are non-veg, veg, and vegan food options. All come with water.

title: Water Distribution at City Hall
description: Clean bottled water available for all affected residents. Bring containers for additional water. Each household can receive up to 5 gallons. ID not required.

title: Shelter at The Midnight Mission
description: Come get 48 hour shelter. No smoking. First come first serve.
address: 601 San Pedro St, Los Angeles, CA 90014

title: Power Storage Sale
description: All power storage machines up to 1000kwh are 50% off at the Home Depot. Supply is limited.
